lexUnit.name: kilt.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a knee-length skirt of pleated tartan cloth, traditionally worn by men as part of Scottish Highland dress and also worn by women and girls. [Clothing]

sentence.text: Pulling on a sweater and wrapping my long kilt around me , I made my way towards Sheikha Grandmother 's house .
I put on my kilt , picked up my bagpipes , clambered aboard the truck , and we were off to the beach .
